notes: Hill soil around stems to increase yield.
Soil must be stone-free for straight roots.
Plant in fall for summer harvest.
Cool season crop; bolts in heat.
Mulch with straw to keep fruit off ground.
Pinch off flowers to prolong leaf production.
Wind pollinated; plant in blocks for better pollination.
Extremely spicy; high heat tolerance; fruit points upward while growing.
Requires a long, hot growing season to develop capsaicin levels.
Vining plant; requires strong trellis support; very high medicinal value.
Heat and drought tolerant; harvest pods when small and tender.
Tropical tree; leaves are most fragrant when fresh; sensitive to frost.
Fastest growing tree; every part of the plant is edible; extremely drought resistant.
